Replace.Text: Each citizen in the city will provide 0.5 [ICON_Production] productivity, and all friendly cities +20% [ICON_FOOD] food.
Thousands of years of prosperity

Maggot guy
Each citizen in the city will provide 0.3 [ICON_Culture] culture value, and the farm +1 [ICON_Food] food.
lead memory

The cost of building the Theater Square is halved, the Roman Theater +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith Points, +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points. [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Literary works +2 [ICON_Science] technology value, +2 [ICON_Faith] faith value, and the [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance provided is doubled. The library +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value, and has an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] slot for great works.
dawn and dawn
Itsen
Chongqing
Hetu Luoshu

Donghuang characteristic buildings replace monuments. +1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity . Does not offer loyalty.
Gu Guang City Well

The Donghuang characteristic area replaces the community and appeared earlier. Base +4 [ICON_Housing] Housing, with additional [ICON_Housing] Housing added based on the cell's Charisma. Has two citizen slots. A number of different bonuses can be obtained from adjacent featured areas and improvements. [NEWLINE] Each time you complete an Ancient Huang Market, the current municipal progress will be accelerated by 5%.
Donghuang Imperial Guard
Donghuang's characteristic anti-cavalry unit replaces the spearmen. Has higher [ICON_Strength] combat strength, +20 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending from ranged attacks.

Yixian, you have cut off the shackles that bound the ancient empire and brought the first light of the new era. The ancient Donghuang civilization began to slowly try to regain its youthful appearance. Science, technology, humanities, diplomacy and economy, and the wisdom of our ancestors will gradually revive from the dusty history under your leadership. The hard-working and wise people of Donghuang will never be timid or flinch. As long as you stick to your true heart, you can stand tall in the world.
Will you sign a friendly covenant with me?
Donâ€™t forget yesterday so that you can better move towards tomorrow...
Want to reconcile? How could it be, I am no longer that fragile Yixian!
Let us lay down our weapons and return to peace, shall we?
I give you the seal and ribbon to pass through our territory.
Do vulgar barbarians even try to set foot in our territory? Please come back.
Our army needs to pass through your territory, please allow us to pass.
I see your army approaching our border, and they don't look like they're here to pay tribute. Please state your intentions!

Fortunately, I am the Yixian of Donghuang Kingdom. Are you here to pay tribute to our heavenly kingdom, which has been prosperous for thousands of years? Haha...I'm sorry, please come and watch the tea and entertain me.
First time meeting, a little respect. Are you interested in coming to a city near us to enjoy tea and art?
Can you exchange information about the capital, which will be helpful for our Donghuang country to develop trade routes.
Is there anything to trade?
Only with harmony and stability can people live and work in peace and contentment, and be prosperous!
War breaks out everywhere and lives are devastated. Such a civilization will not last long.
(You have been recognized by Yixian)
(You went against Yixian's agenda)
There is no colorful phoenix flying in the body, but there is a clear understanding in the heart. May peace last forever~
It seems that you are not the person I am waiting for.
Will you enter into a covenant of friendship with me?
Thanks.
I disagree.
I don't know what your intention is to offend me, Donghuang. Now that you are here, we don't have to be polite anymore!
Stability and peace are naturally a good thing, but achieving true peace sometimes requires war!
How could it be, I am obviously no longer the fragile, crying little girl back then.
I liked the tributes your envoys brought so much that I hosted a banquet for them myself!
I, the land of Donghuang, is vast and rich in resources, and I cannot look down upon ordinary things like you. Please come back.
I will send an envoy to give you some Donghuang specialties. Please accept these gifts.
How can a small country have the courage and guts to accuse me, Donghuang? I have recorded this account.
Barbarians, crude and uneducated people will eventually be swallowed up by the torrent of history! (condemn you)
peace and prosperity
They like civilizations with large populations and dislike civilizations with constant wars.
